item.title: Consistent messaging
item.description: Modern messaging infrastructures offer delivery guarantees that make it non-trivial to build distributed systems. Robust solutions require a good understanding of what can and can’t happen in a system and how that affects business level behavior. This post walks through scenarios that look at the main challenges from the system consistency perspective and sketches possible solutions. A system We will assume that systems in focus consist of endpoints, each owning a distinct piece of state.
